long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download images and videos directly from the Meta Ads Library with ease.

Meta Library Downloader is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to make your experience with the Meta Ads Library more productive. With just one click, you can effortlessly download high-quality images and videos directly from ads, saving you time and effort.

Key features:

Download any ad's media (images or videos) in its best available quality.
User-friendly interface with a lightweight design.
Automatically skips small or unnecessary media files.
Perfect for marketers, researchers, and content creators.
